participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Creative and adventurous, Emma is eager to explore new looks and experiences. She has a playful side that enjoys dressing up and expressing her interests.
participant_1.background: I want to change my look to reflect my new single status. I think about the beauty of nature and how lucky I am to experience it with my dog. I am a terrible speller. I recently got to dress up and explore my nerdy side at Comic Con. I work for a magazine.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Jake is down-to-earth and creative, with a passion for running and a strong connection to his roots. He values individuality and seeks a comfortable space to express himself.
participant_2.background: I took my friend from out of town to see Taylor Swift in concert on my last vacation. I like to go running. I am angry at my coworker. My new home will be a place where I can express my creativity and individuality, and where I can feel safe and comfortable. I did not go to college because I run the family farm.

content.text: Heyy I'm on a date with my boyfriend tonight. Can you give me a few good things to talk about?
What do you like to do?
I love to hike and I like to go to comic con. I like dressing up and I love Taylor Swift.
I recently took my friend to a Taylor Swift concert, that was a blast! Do you have any plans for the future?
I am thinking about changing my look now that I am single. I am also trying to decide where I want to live.
I am looking for a new place too, I want to find a place that feels like home.
I want a place where I can be creative and have my own space.
That's a good idea. I think my new home will be a place where I can express my individuality.
I think so too. I like to be able to have my own space and I want to be able to feel safe and comfortable.
Me too! I have a great dog and he is my best friend.
I love dogs! They are the best.
I think so too! I am so glad we are talking I am really excited about my date and I just have so much to share!
I am glad I could help! I hope you have a great time on your date
